channel.title: The Voice on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Voice on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: NBC Moves ‘The Hunting Party’ to Midseason as It Sets Fall Premieres
item.description: The most recent season of ‘Law & Order: Organized Crime,’ which streamed on Peacock, will get a broadcast run in the fall.

item.title: NBC Moves ‘The Hunting Party’ to Midseason as It Sets Fall Premieres
item.description: The most recent season of ‘Law & Order: Organized Crime,’ which streamed on Peacock, will get a broadcast run in the fall.

item.title: ‘The Voice’ Sets Adam Levine, John Legend and Kelly Clarkson as Season 29 Coaches
item.description: The long-running NBC show will also revamp its format somewhat for the spring 2026 edition.
